The manga builds up slowly and shows no foreshadowing or hints to Hanna’s infidelity in the second half and the story has an open ending as it is uncertain whether Hanna got pregnant, caught STDs or would ever come back.


The artist is more concerned about completely showing all parts of the sexual action including insertion and vigorous thrusting and less concerned about depicting and exaggerating facial expressions and orgasms of the characters in other hentai manga, opting instead for a cinematic continuous feel rather than creating panels showing the character’s intense feelings during rough sex. 

Due to this technique utilising less of potential of the comic medium to cut simulatenously to both the action and the actors’ facial expressions, viewers who have more experience with Western audiovisual pornography which typically only depict the action could be left with disappointment.
